text: ‎“enikkusesam ninnal areyan valippetuka"yenn ‎asannamarananayirikke ya'akhub tanre makkaleatu ‎ceadiccappeal ninnalavite untayirunnea? avar ‎parannu: "nannal annayute daivatte tanneyan ‎valippetuka. annayute pitavaya ‎ibrahiminreyum isma'ilinreyum ‎is'hakhinreyum nathanaya a eka daivatte. ‎nannal avane anusaricc jivikkunnavarakum." ‎
